page.title: 15General Description
page.content: Unlike{Longside,Mintlaw}was a planned village which lies north of the River {Ugie.Longside,}however has grown naturally throughout the years and has developed into a close_knit community. {Longside}with its narrow streets and its large variety of houses may appear a quiet little village but you'd be surprised at the entertainment,such as galas,roups and coffee_mornings that the village can organise whereas {Mintlaw}does not have quite as much. {Mintlaw}has three schools including a six year academy but in comparison {Longside}has one primary school which is built in two parts.Both villages have a sports ground,although{Mintlaw does not have a golf course it has football grounds,bowling greens and tennis courts the same as{Longside.
